charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0401_0300_:
Nice! The perfect way to clear one’s head
between battles.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0402_0500_:
Nice! The perfect way to clear one’s head
between battles.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_0600_:
I was just going around saying hi to all the
Trainers that I battled in the past.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_0700_:
Of course, Pokémon battles are a greeting in
and of themselves!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0401_0900_:
Yep! In fact, there was a time when I traveled
and fought Trainers all over the Kanto region!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0402_1100_:
Well, there was a time when I traveled and
fought Trainers all over the Kanto region!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_1200_:
It was more of a training journey! My Pokémon
and I traveled to make ourselves stronger!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0401_1400_: Thanks! Lycanroc seems to appreciate it, too!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0402_1600_:
Hmm, I suppose it is! And thanks, I’ll take the
compliment. Lycanroc seems to appreciate it, too!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_1700_:
Lycanroc—when he was still a Rockruff—and 
all my other Pokémon became stronger with me
as we journeyed through Kanto.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_1800_:
It was because of those experiences that I was
able to create the Alola League, yeah!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_1900_:
Thanks to that, a lot of strong Trainers found
themselves in Alola.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_2000_:
Battling against them allowed me to raise my skills
as a Trainer and make my Pokémon even stronger!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_2100_:
Take Brock, for example. He fights with
Rock-type Pokémon, you know.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_2200_:
Since Lycanroc’s a Rock type, too, we had a
leisurely...er, I mean...intense battle!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0401_2400_:
I know, right? And Lycanroc especially seems to
want to get stronger.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0402_2600_:
You bet I do! And Lycanroc especially seems to
want to get stronger.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_2700_:
A Lycanroc in its Midday Form will typically be
very loyal and follow its Trainer’s commands
to a tee, yeah!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_2800_:
But my Lycanroc is a little different,
despite having evolved into Midday Form.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_2900_:
If I give an order he doesn’t like, 
he ignores me.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_3000_: He acts as if he’s in Midnight Form!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_3100_:
So that helps me get better as well! I try to get
stronger so I can keep fighting beside Lycanroc!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_3200_:
We’re gonna continue getting stronger,
just like you guys are, yeah!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_3300_:
Becoming friends is important, but that’s not the
only way for Trainers and their Pokémon to be.
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0401_3500_:
I’m glad. I know you have your own strengths
and ways of interacting with your Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0402_3700_:
Don’t worry. I know you’ve your own strengths
and ways of interacting with your Pokémon, too!
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_3900_:
do you think I beat the Lance, the Indigo
Champion, when I was in Kanto?
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0401_4100_:
You flatter me! Maybe I’ll tell you that
story sometime...
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_0402_4300_:
Good to know where you stand!
Maybe I’ll tell you that story sometime...
charaepi_ch0001_00_kukui/2301_1201_4400_:
Since we’ve battled each other, I’d be curious to
hear what you think!
